Makio MeshLine

Appearance

Makio MeshLineA performant and customizable line solution for Three.js.

Built for the future, with WebGPU and NodeMaterial in mind. Simple to use, yet powerful enough for complex effects.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Highly Customizable

Control everything from lineWidth and color to gradients, dashing, and opacity. Create the exact line style you need.

Performant by Default

Leverages Three.js's modern NodeMaterial system for efficient rendering, especially with WebGPU.

Advanced Effects

Easily apply textures and alpha maps to your lines, or animate them with built-in percentage-based visibility.

Simple, Declarative API

Get up and running in minutes. The API is designed to be intuitive and easy to integrate into any Three.js project.
